articles.title: CWI not to renew Courtney Walsh's contract as head coach of West Indies women's team - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Assistant coaches Robert Samuels and Corey Collymore are out too; recruitment process to find replacements to begin soon
articles.content: [File photo] Courtney Walsh took over as West Indies head coach in October 2020  •  ICC via Getty Images

articles.title: Rinku Singh Reveals Text He Sent To Yash Dayal After '5 Sixes' Moment In KKR vs GT Match - NDTV Sports
articles.description: KKR's historic win over GT definitely made Rinku Singh a hero, but left-arm GT pacer Yash Dayal, who was at the receiving end of his carnage in the final over, was visibly low.

articles.title: Ben Stokes out to unleash England attack on Australia - ICC Cricket
articles.description: England skipper wants to add a fresh threat to the aggressive game-plan that has helped his team secure 10 wins in 12 Tests when Australia tour for the Ashes.
